Package infodynamics.measures.continuous.kernel

Class Summary
ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorCorrelationIntegrals  
ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorKernel Implements an active information storage calculator using kernel estimation.
EntropyCalculatorKernel  
EntropyCalculatorMultiVariateKernel Class to compute entropy for a multi-variate values, using kernel estimates.
KernelCount Structure to hold a kernel count, the total count it was taken from, and an array of booleans indicating which time points got counted
KernelEstimatorMultiVariate Class to maintain probability distribution function for a multivariate set, using kernel estimates.
KernelEstimatorTransferEntropy Kernel estimator for use with the transfer entropy.
KernelEstimatorTransferEntropyMultiVariate Kernel estimator for use with the transfer entropy on multivariate source and destination.
KernelEstimatorUniVariate Class to maintain probability distribution function for a single variable, using kernel estimates.
MultiInfoCalculatorKernel  
MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKernel Computes the differential mutual information of two given multivariate sets of observations, using kernel estimation.
MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateWithDiscreteKernel  
TransferEntropyCalculatorKernel Implements a transfer entropy calculator using kernel estimation.
TransferEntropyCalculatorKernelPlain Implements a transfer entropy calculator using kernel estimation.
TransferEntropyCalculatorKernelPlainIterators Implements a transfer entropy calculator using kernel estimation.
TransferEntropyCalculatorKernelSeparate Implements a transfer entropy calculator using kernel estimation.
TransferEntropyCalculatorMultiVariateKernel Implements a transfer entropy calculator using kernel estimation.
TransferEntropyCalculatorMultiVariateSingleObservationsKernel Implements a transfer entropy calculator using kernel estimation.
TransferEntropyKernelCounts Structure to hold the results of the kernel estimation for one time point
